title: Vuelta a España stage 13: Michael Woods Soloes to Summit Win, Ben O’Connor Loses More Time
content:
Primož Roglič launches huge attack, dropping overall leader O’Connor and inching ever-closer to the red jersey.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 13: Michael Woods Soloes to Summit Win, Ben O’Connor Loses More Time on Velo.
author: sstokes
